com.magnet.attributes.api

Interface AttributeContainerWriteable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributeContainer, Modifiable, ReadOnlyTarget, Validatable

    public interface AttributeContainerWriteable
extends AttributeContainer, ReadOnlyTarget, Validatable, Modifiable
    Writable version of the AttributeContainer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void applyAttributes(Map<String,Object> keyValuePairs)
      Sets the specified attributes in bulk.
      void setAttribute(String key, Object value)
      Puts a copy of the value in the container, replacing whatever was previously there for that key.
      boolean setForUpdate(boolean isForUpdate)
      Is this record intended for update.
      void setSchema(AttributeSchema newSchema)
      Replace the existing schema with this new one.
      void setSparse(boolean isSparse)
      Set the AttributeContainer to be in "sparse" mode.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.magnet.attributes.api.AttributeContainer

        compareTo, containsKey, getAttributes, getAttributeSchema, getValue, getValueAsString, isSparse, match

      • Methods inherited from interface com.magnet.common.api.ReadOnlyTarget

        isReadOnly, setReadOnly

      • Methods inherited from interface com.magnet.common.api.Validatable

        assertIsValid, isValid

      • Methods inherited from interface com.magnet.common.api.Modifiable

        isModified, setModified, setModified

    • Method Detail

      • setSparse

        void setSparse(boolean isSparse)
        Set the AttributeContainer to be in "sparse" mode. This means that the container will not be validatable.

      • setForUpdate

        boolean setForUpdate(boolean isForUpdate)
        Is this record intended for update. In update mode isValid() is more relaxed in that the state may be a delta as opposed to the entire node state.
        Parameters:
        isForUpdate - whether is in update mode

      • setAttribute

        void setAttribute(String key,
                Object value)
        Puts a copy of the value in the container, replacing whatever was previously there for that key.
        Parameters:
        key - the key to store the value for.
        value - the value.

      • applyAttributes

        void applyAttributes(Map<String,Object> keyValuePairs)
        Sets the specified attributes in bulk.
        Parameters:
        keyValuePairs - the (scope,name)->value values.

      • setSchema

        void setSchema(AttributeSchema newSchema)
        Replace the existing schema with this new one.
        Parameters:
        newSchema -
